Locale.Value:
1. Upgraded the AI Copywriting tool (powered by ChatGPT), the new preset options can help you quickly write YouTube Titles, Descriptions, and more.
2. Supports setting in, out, and loop animations for titles and adjusting the duration of the animations.
3. Supports extending the duration of Stickers and Gifs on the timeline.
4. Optimized cloud space purchase page.
5. Supports backup custom "Adjustment Layers" in your media library to the cloud.
6. When adjusting video properties, the value is displayed in real time.
7. When drawing a mask, zoom in on the screen in real time to facilitate fine-grained operations.
8. Support setting video thumbnail and uploading to YouTube directly from Filmora.
9. Speech to Text adds 26 new languages. Text to Speech adds 10 new languages.
10. You can now rate the effetcs and suggest to add new effects in Filmora.
11. Added search history function.
12. Optimized search result guidance when no result is found.
13. Support copying and pasting keyframes.
14. Support copying project media to global media.
15. Fixed some known issues and improved product stability.
